column2:
"You there! Long time, no see! It's me, Pati! Wait,
have we met? Oh right, I don't care!"

"You look like the smart sort, always eager for the
latest intel! Yeah? Yeah?! I'm right, aren't I?"

"Well, lucky you! You just found Pati and Tia, the
top recon and intel team in ARKS! We are
Pati-cularly adept at finding Tia-rrific information!"

"Ugh, haven't you heard that puns are the lowest
form of humor, Pati? Please forgive my sister. "

"It's true that we're in the intelligence business,
though. Lately we've been investigating the
strange D-arker activity on Naberius."

"Ooh, the D-arkers that are going around looking for something?
Rumor has it they're way stronger than normal!"

"They've wiped out a couple of teams who got too
close already. Spooky stuff, huh?"

"We followed the rumor trail down there, but never spotted the creatures in question,
for better or worse."

"They don't seem to appear much when ARKS ops
are around, which is strange enough. Maybe they
really do have some goal aside from killing us off."

"Spoookyyy! Anyway, if you happen to see these
creeps, give us a call straight away! Okay?
It's a promise, right?! Okay!"

"あら、アナタ！
この前会った？　会ってない？
まあ、どっちでもいいか！"

"情報が欲しそうな顔をしてるわね？
してるでしょ？　欲しいでしょ？
うんうん、素直なのはいいことだよ！"

"アークスいちの情報屋さん！
チーム『パティエンティア』とは
あたしたちのこと！"

"あんまり気にしないで。
パティちゃんが勝手に
そう名乗っているだけだから。"

"ただ、情報を集めているのは本当。
そうね、例えば最近だと……
ナベリウスにいた変なダーカー、とか？"

"はいはいはーい！
あの噂になってる、もの探しダーカー！
普通のやつより、かなーり強いのかも！"

"なんとか、ってチームも
そいつらに油断しててやられたって！
危ないねー！　おっかないねー！"

"噂を聞いて、探しに行ったけど
生憎というか、幸いというか
私達は発見できずじまい。"

"姿を見せることもまれみたいだし
もしかすると、アークスを倒す以外の
目的があるのかも。"

"不気味っ、不敵っ！
一体何がしたいんだろ！
もし見かけたら、教えてねー！"
